messages.message:
:bug:Bug: Noticing that on mobile when you select multiple files in the file picker, they get added as one file and digitization fails. Repro video attached.
cc: @Varun Jain @Travis @Subash

Thanks a lot for sharing, @avi !

This is the same bug that I had reported some days ago in the mobile feedback doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1A8QyCs5tMfrxKphx_kA-5nXayWWWAWHF2LeqE6GgYnM/edit). This is a blocker and needs to be resolved before we ship mobile experience with 23.41 release.

cc: @andy @Kerry
@Travis do you want to take a look at this
I was debating that on mobile we don’t allow multiple files to be uploaded in this version.
I suppose we only rename things when it’s a picture taken. But when it’s files we just upload the actual files
@Varun Jain Also currently we allow only image uploads. Should we allow pdf uploads at least if not other types ?
I also enable pdfs and txt files.
The multi file option won’t take too much time to implement. I also would like to evaluate a solution for multi page camera uploads.
